IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: DEVELOP & PROMOTE HEALTH CARE EDUCATION, INFORMATION & CONSULTATION PROGRAMS AND SERVICES THAT ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF HEALTH CARE PROVIDED IN FLORIDA.
IRS990.MissionDesc: DEVELOP & PROMOTE HEALTH CARE EDUCATION, INFORMATION & CONSULTATIONPROGRAMS AND SERVICES THAT ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF HEALTH CARE PROVIDEDIN FLORIDA.
IRS990.Desc: PROMOTED ABILITY OF MEMBER HOSPITALS AND HEALTHCARE SYSTEMS TOEFFECTIVELY AND EFFICIENTLY SERVE HEALTHCARE NEEDS OF THEIR COMMUNITIESTHROUGH ADVOCACY, EDUCATION, RESEARCH, REPRESENTATION AND SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS, THE ASSOCIATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO EXAMINATIONS BY MAJOR TAX JURISDICTIONS FOR YEARS ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2018, AND PRIOR.

THE ORGANIZATION PAID FOR HEALTH CLUB DUES TOTALING $3,093 FOR SEVERAL INDIVIDUALS LISTED ON PART VII. NON-QUALIFIED DEFERRED COMPENSATION PAYMENTS RECEIVED AND INCLUDED IN WAGES AS FOLLOWS: MARY MAYHEW - $26,994.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS ELECT A BOARD OF DIRECTORS EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE ARE TIMES THAT THE MEMBERSHIP WILL VOTE ON DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY, INCLUDING BUDGETS AND BY-LAWS CHANGES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE TAX RETURN IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AFTER FILING THE RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IT IS REGULARLY MONITORED THROUGH CONVERSATIONS WITH BOARD MEMBERS AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT'S SALARY IS DETERMINED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND HIS NEGOTIATED CONTRACT. THE OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES' SALARIES ARE DETERMINED BY AN EVALUATION PROCESS AND THE PRESIDENT DETERMINES WHAT SALARY INCREASE THE EMPLOYEE WILL RECEIVE WITHIN THE PARAMETERS OF THE BUDGET FOR SALARIES FOR THE YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ASSOCIATION DOES NOT MAKE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
STATE AND FEDERAL ADVOCACY SERVICES 831,226. RESEARCH AND DATA SERVICES 164,821.
